articles.title: CPRK Regards S. Korea's Full Participation in PSI as Declaration of War against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Regards S. Korea's Full Participation in PSI as Declaration of War against DPRK
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea keen on the moves for confrontation and war against the DPRK in league with foreign forces on May 26 officially declared at last it would fully participate in the PSI despite the unanimous opposition of all Koreans and public opinion at home and abroad. 
					 The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on May 27 in this regard. 
					
					 It said:
					
					 The so-called PSI is a mechanism for a war of aggression built by the U.S. against the DPRK under the pretext of intercepting and blockading ships and planes, etc. suspicious of transporting weapons of mass destruction including nuclear weapons and missiles.
					
					 The PSI has been criticized and repudiated at home and abroad for its aggressive nature and illegality.
					
					 Moreover, full participation in the PSI by a side on the Korean Peninsula where the state of military confrontation is growing acute and there is constant danger of military conflict itself means igniting a war. 
					
					 The DPRK, therefore, has already seriously warned the south Korean authorities against the above-said moves and repeatedly clarified its stand that it would strongly counter those moves of the Lee group, in particular, regarding them as a declaration of a war as it is pursuant to its American master's policy. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Lee group undisguisedly took a step of fully participating in the PSI, which former regimes dared not do so, bringing the situation on the Korean Peninsula and inter-Korean relations beyond the uncontrollable danger line of a war.
					
					 It is preposterous for the Lee group to have opted to fully participate in the PSI under the pretext of the underground nuclear test of the DPRK for self-defense.
					
					 It is nothing strange and quite natural for a nuclear weapons state to conduct a nuclear test.
					
					 The anti-DPRK racket kicked up by the U.S. and its followers under that pretext is not truly aimed at the nuclear non-proliferation but prompted by their black-hearted intention to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Now that the south Korean puppets were so ridiculous as to join in the said racket and dare declare a war against compatriots through their full participation in the PSI, the DPRK is compelled to take a decisive measure, as it has already warned.
					
					 The DPRK solemnly declares as follows in view of the prevailing situation:
					
					 First, The DPRK will deal a decisive and merciless retaliatory blow, no matter from which place, at any attempt to stop, check and inspect its vessels, regarding it as a violation of its inviolable sovereignty and territory and a grave provocation to it.
					
					 Second, The DPRK will take such a practical counter-action as in the wartime now that the south Korean authorities declared a war in wanton violation of its dignity and sovereignty by fully participating in the PSI.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon the south Korean puppet group of traitors for going mad with confrontation and war, bereft of any reason as servants for outside forces in the moves for a war of aggression. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group will be held wholly accountable for the disastrous consequences to be entailed by its reckless hostile acts against the DPRK.

articles.title: KPA Panmunjom Mission Clarifies Revolutionary Armed Forces' Principled Stand
articles.content:
KPA Panmunjom Mission Clarifies Revolutionary Armed Forces' Principled Stand
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army issued a statement Wednesday in connection with the fact that the unstable situation created in Korea due to the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' reckless moves to "fully participate" in the U.S.-led PSI is now inching close an extreme phase where a war may break out any moment. 
					 The present rulers of the U.S. including Obama egged the south Korean puppets on to participate in the PSI, asserting that it is necessary to turn the PSI into a "lasting international regime," the statement noted, and continued:
					
					 This is a wanton violation and clear negation of not only international law but the Korean Armistice Agreement which bans "any form of blockade" against the other belligerent party.
					
					 The Lee group has unhesitatingly taken the step of "fully participating" in the PSI, blindly yielding to its master as it is steeped in sycophancy and submission to the marrow of its bones. In view of this situation the Panmunjom Mission of the KPA clarifies the following principled stand of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK: 
					
					1. Our revolutionary armed forces, as they have already declared, will regard the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' "full participation" in the PSI as a declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 Accordingly, they will regard any hostile actions against the DPRK, including checkup and inspection of its peaceful vessels, as an unpardonable encroachment on the DPRK's sovereignty and counter them with prompt and strong military strikes.
					
					2.  The Korean People's Army will not be bound to the Armistice Agreement any longer since the present ruling quarters of the United States, keen on the moves to stifle the DPRK, plugged the south Korean puppets into the PSI at last, denying not only international law but the AA itself and discarding even its responsibility as a signatory to the agreement.
					
					 In case the AA loses its binding force, the Korean Peninsula is bound to immediately return to a state of war from a legal point of view and so our revolutionary armed forces will go over to corresponding military actions.
					
					3.  For the present, we will not guarantee the legal status of the five islands under the south side's control (Paekryong, Taechong, Sochong, Yonphyong and U islands) in our side's territorial waters northwest of the extension of the Military Demarcation Line in the West Sea of Korea and safe sailing of warships of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and the south Korean puppet navy and civilian ships operating in the waters around there.
					
					 It is illogical for the DPRK to unilaterally meet the requirements of fair international law and the bilateral agreement since the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors have reneged on them. Nothing is graver mistake than to calculate that the American-style Jungle law can work on the DPRK.
					
					 They should bear in mind that the DPRK has tremendous military muscle and its own method of strike able to conquer any targets in its vicinity at one stroke or hit the U.S. on the raw, if necessary.
					
					 Those who provoke the DPRK once will not be able to escape its unimaginable and merciless punishment.

articles.title: Greetings to Ethiopian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Ethiopian President
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Girma Wolde-Giorgis, President of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, on its national day.
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Ethiopia would continue to develop on good terms, Kim sincerely wished the President and the people of Ethiopia fresh success in the future work for peace, stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Workers' Party of Turkey
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Workers' Party of Turkey
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Turkey.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Wednesday by Dasar Karadag, member of the Party Central Committee, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Nigerians Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Nigerians Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Yusuf Amuda Abubakar, Nigerian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy Wednesday did friendship labour on the DPRK-Nigeria Friendship Haksan Cooperative Farm in Hyongjesan District, Pyongyang.
					 They helped the farmers in sowing beans and conversed with officials of the farm during break, deepening the friendly feelings.
					
					 The ambassador said that they would strive to develop the Nigeria-DPRK friendly relations and hoped that the farm would make big success in the agricultural production.
					
					 They conveyed farming materials to the farm.

articles.title: DPRK Judokas Prove Successful at Asian Judo Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Judokas Prove Successful at Asian Judo Championship
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK judokas garnered one gold medal, two silver medals and two bronze medals at the 2009 Asian Judo Championship.
					 Rim Yun Hui beat all her rivals with ippon in the women's 57kg category event, coming first to win the prize for the best player.
					
					 Kim Kyong Jin and Hwang Chun Gum each bagged silver medals in the men's 60kg and women's 63kg category contests while Kim Chol Su and Hyon Jong Hui won bronze medals in the men's 73kg and women's 78kg category events respectively.

articles.title: Korean April 25 Film Studio, Military Film Creation Centre
articles.content:
Korean April 25 Film Studio, Military Film Creation Centre
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean April 25 Film Studio some time ago celebrated the 50th anniversary of its foundation.
					The studio (The Korean People's Army February 8 Film Studio at birth), the first military film creation group in the DPRK, has contributed in the past days to bringing up the soldiers and people into stout fighters defending the leader at the cost of their lives.
					
					It has produced lots of films on the themes of the revolutionary tradition and military affairs and war since it released its first dramatic war film "Defenders of Height 1211".
					
					The treasure house of Juche-oriented film art has been enriched by the revolutionary film "Far Away from Headquarters" and other films dealing with the revolutionary history of family members of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu, the feature films "An Unattached Unit", "The Brigade Commander's Former Superior", "Wolmi Island", "Rhododendron" and "Morning Star," the full-length multi-part sequel film "The Nation and Destiny" and a number of other films. 
					
					Other films produced by the studio include the feature films "Glow above Distant Mountain", "The Road He Is Walking", "Inheritance" and "Notes of a Woman Soldier" which are beating with the spirit of the Songun era.
					
					The recently produced feature films "A White Gem", "The Great Bear" and "The Lieutenant in Those Days" rendered services for kindling a flame of the literary and art revolution in the Songun era.
					
					It also put on stage several light comedies including "Comrades" and "Chol Pass" loudly singing of the validity and invincibility of Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					The film studio, a winner of "Order of Kim Il Sung", has been developed into a film creation centre equipped with up-to-dated facilities and produced a good many People's Artists, People's Artistes, Merited Artists and Merited Artistes loved by people.
					
					Today it is bringing about a great upswing in creation in the spirit and mettle with which it rose in a film revolution in the 1970s.

articles.title: Central Youth Hall
articles.content:
Central Youth Hall
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The Central Youth Hall standing on a bank of River Taedong with graceful architectural beauty greets its 20th birthday.
					 The hall, opened on May 18, Juche 78 (1989), is a reliable extracurricular centre for youth.
					
					 It consists of theatres, circle rooms, rooms for sports and amusement games.
					
					 It is furnished well with musical instruments of various kinds, computers, cars, karaoke equipment, electronic amusement facilities and other means for sports and cultural and emotional life.
					
					 There young people are deepening their scientific and technological knowledge and doing extracurricular sports and amusement activities according to their hobbies and wishes.
					
					 Every Sunday witnesses a cheerful dancing party in the hall.
					
					 Colorful activities such as public political and artistic activities are held in the hall.
					
					 Different kinds of forums and debates to learn from various positive examples have been sponsored there with attendance of millions of young people on thousands of occasions and educational activities through visual aids such as photo and picture are being held one after another.
					
					 The extracurricular activities of the hall help young men and women prepare themselves as reliable main force of the revolution and as successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Two Big and Small Brick-carrying Frame
articles.content:
Two Big and Small Brick-carrying Frames
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk visited the building site of Kim Chaek University of Technology (then Pyongyang University of Technology) together with young Kim Jong Il early in one spring morning of Juche 38 (1949).
					She went round the building site, conducted by a field official, and told him earnestly that they should meet at an early date the lifelong desire of President Kim Il Sung who wanted to see technicians brought up by the university manufacturing modern machinery, trains and motorcars.
					
					After a while she said: "Let's work in a hurry as lots of people are rendering labor assistance", asking him to bring a brick-carrying frame.
					
					Then, the official told her how she could do such a work as going up and down the steep scaffolds with bricks on her back. She rolled up her sleeves, saying that she managed to find time to work and would feel refreshed by much perspiration.
					
					Young Kim Jong Il also asked him to make a frame.
					
					Surprised by his words, the official said he in his young age could not carry bricks on the back and that he must not do such a work.
					
					She, with a smile, affirmed his words and asked the official to make a small frame for him.
					
					She and young Kim Jong Il, together with constructors, carried bricks on their backs, going up and down the steep scaffolds. 
					
					Indeed, the immortal exploits performed by Kim Jong Suk for the prosperity of the country will shine long along with the efforts to build a great, prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. House of Representatives International Relations Committee submitted to Congress on May 6 "a bill on international control over the uranium extraction and processing for 2009" calling on the U.S. government to ban the provision of technology, materials and services concerning the uranium extraction and processing to the DPRK, Iran and Syria and take sanctions against them in case they proliferate such technology in cooperation with other countries.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This reveals itself that the United States is pursuing the policy of confrontation with the DPRK to stand up against it to the last from the stand of strength.
					
					 The U.S. policy of sanctions against the DPRK is a blatant challenge to the DPRK's dignity, sovereignty and right to existence and a wanton infringement upon them, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has desperately hamstrung the DPRK's economic development, enforcing the policies of economic sanctions and blockade for several decades for the mere reason that it incurred its displeasure. 
					
					 Needless to say, it is entirely due to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK that the bilateral relations had to go from bad to worse despite the international community's strenuous efforts to stabilize the situation on the Korean Peninsula. This is the reason why the DPRK raised the U.S. drop of its hostile policy toward the DPRK as a precondition for settling issues. 
					
					 No change can be expected from the United States unless it makes a switchover in its stance of antagonizing and rejecting the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can bring the DPRK to its knees through sanctions, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: U.S. Wholly to Blame for Posing Nuclear Threat to World
articles.content:
U.S. Wholly to Blame for Posing Nuclear Threat to World
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The suprapartisan U.S. Congressional Commission was reported recently to have worked out and presented a "report on the strategic nuclear posture" the keynote of which is the assertion that the U.S. should have a "powerful and trustworthy nuclear deterrent" till a "radical change has taken place in the world political order" as a world free from nukes is far off.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The above-said report, in essence, serves as an anti-peace document as it calls for the beefing of modern nuclear forces and the stepped-up policy of nuclear blackmail.
					
					 Referring to the fact that voices criticizing and ridiculing the U.S. are heard from Western media, the commentary says:
					
					 This tone goes to prove that the U.S. nuclear policy is unjust and obviously the U.S. is entirely to blame for spreading nukes and posing the nuclear threat worldwide.
					
					 It was the U.S. that manufactured nuclear weapons, imposing a nuclear holocaust upon mankind for the first time in the world. It is again the U.S. which has the greatest stockpile of nukes and missiles in the world and threatens and blackmails other countries with them.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula, in particular, is fraught with the biggest nuclear threat and the danger of a nuclear war posed by the U.S.
					
					The U.S. keeps the DPRK within the striking range of its nuclear weapons and missiles in south Korea and in its vicinity and on its mainland.
					
					 The nuclear and missile threat to the DPRK is coming from the U.S. and it is the root cause of the nuclear threat and the danger of a nuclear war mounting on the Korean Peninsula. With nothing can it excuse itself for them.
					
					 The world sees through the criminal nature of the U.S. wholly to blame for the nuclear threat to it and remains highly vigilant against its moves.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to roll back its anti-peace double-dealing nuclear policy, paying heed to the above-mentioned Western media's criticism and derision of it.

articles.title: Removal of U.S.-South Korea "Annual Security Consultative Meeting" Demanded
articles.content:
Removal of U.S.-South Korea "Annual Security Consultative Meeting" Demanded
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppets convened the 1st "defense ministerial-level talks" under the pretext of "security" on May 27, 1968, at which they discussed bolstering the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea and stepping up the military "aid" to south Korea and the "modernization" of the puppet armed forces.
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun today carries a signed commentary branding the move as a revelation of the bellicose design of the U.S. seeking to turn south Korea into its out-and-out military colony and ignite a war of aggression on the DPRK and the south Korean military fascist clique servile to it.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppets developed the "talks" into an "annual security consultative meeting" dealing with even the diplomatic affairs at the 4th round of the "talks" in July 1971, the commentary notes, and says:
					
					 The south Korea-U.S. "annual security consultative meeting", an outcome of the dangerous collusion of the warmongers at home and abroad seeking to stifle the DPRK militarily, is evidently a criminal aggression mechanism as it has served to intensify the U.S. military occupation and domination over south Korea, curb the Korean nation's struggle for peace of the Korean Peninsula and the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and steadily increase the inter-Korean confrontation and the danger of war.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are being deteriorated and the danger of a nuclear war is getting more serious on the peninsula with each passing day due to the U.S. imperialists' persistent hostile policy towards the DPRK and the anti-DPRK war moves of the Lee Myung Bak group following it.
					
					 The history and reality clearly prove that it is impossible for the Korean nation to secure the enduring peace on the peninsula and evade the fate of suffering from the disaster of a nuclear war unless an end is put to the dangerous military cooperation system and war conspiracy between the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers designed to realize their ambition for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 The military nexus between the U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces can never be allowed as it is swimming against the trend of the times towards the independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The said "annual security consultative meeting" should be dissolved unconditionally as it serves to justify the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' presence in south Korea, deepen its military dependence on the U.S. and increase the danger of a war against the DPRK.

articles.title: Ex-Prime Minister Abe's Outbursts Flayed
articles.content:
Ex-Prime Minister Abe's Outbursts Flayed
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Ex-Prime Minister Abe, an icon of Japan's ultra-right conservatives, went off political spasm again. 
					 He recently underscored again the "need" to adjust the legislation for attacking the missile base of the DPRK. 
					
					 This is nothing but despicable anti-DPRK rhetoric let loose by a militarist maniac almost every day, keen on the hostile moves against the DPRK.
					
					 A scrutiny into what Abe uttered and did at different times and on various occasions clearly suggests his true colors as a reactionary of history and the ultra-right element.
					
					 Abe styling himself a politician represents the ultra-nationalists who appeared in the Japanese society after the war, reflecting the neo- fascist atmosphere. 
					
					 His disposition as the dyed-in-the-wool right-wing reactionary element found its vivid manifestation in his stand toward the DPRK.
					
					 It was Abe that took the lead in prohibiting the entry of ship Mangyongbong-92 into a Japanese port by invoking the "law banning the port calls of specified ships" over the DPRK's "missile threat." It was again Abe that called on the UN to convene a UNSC meeting for applying sanctions against the DPRK, asserting that "Japan would examine all possible sanctions against it".
					
					 During the tenure of his office which lasted not more than a year, Abe upgraded the Defence Agency into the Ministry of Defence, the step no successive prime ministers dared take, and called for adopting "a permanent legislation" and the creation of the "security council," the policy coordinating mechanism.
					
					 Abe uttered that "there are no war criminals and there have been none of them in Japan" and "the sentences passed by the Tokyo International Tribunal are illegal and invalid in view of Japan's law." It was again Abe who extremely stirred up the hoisting of "Hinomaru" and singing of "Kimigayo" at schools, supporting visits to "Yasukuni Shrine" and categorically denying the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					  The international community is aware of the ulterior intention of Abe, paying attention to the desperate anti-DPRK moves stepped up by him, bereft of reason.
					
					 Abe's anti-DPRK diatribe was not prompted by the fear that Japan's security might be endangered when its sky would fall immediately. 
					
					 He sought to incite bitterness towards Koreans and hostility toward the DPRK among Japanese and improve his clout whenever an opportunity presented itself. It was, therefore, a poor trick to gratify his political ambition to consolidate his political base. 
					
					 He was pushed to the margin of the society for revealing his vulnerability as the prime minister, besmirching the political landscape but his greed for power remains unchanged. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the political landscape in Japan where such guys as Abe are allowed to ride roughshod. 
					
					 Such practices of Abe as going busy to bring the past back are painted as "patriotic acts."
					
					 The process of turning politics rightist, the society reactionary and conservative is being accelerated as the days go by. 
					
					 The peace and security of Asia are being jeopardized by those who seek to stem the trend of history. 
					
					 No future is in store for Japan as its moves for militarization are frantically stepped up by the militarist maniacs.

articles.title: End to Fascist Dictatorship in S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
End to Fascist Dictatorship in S. Korea Demanded
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Intolerable is the treacherous fascist dictatorial rule enforced under the signboard of "pragmatism" as it blocks the independence and democracy of the south Korean society and does harm to the cause of the country's reunification, the desire of all the compatriots. A definite end should be put to it. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday urges this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group has quelled the aspiration and desire of the popular masses for the independence, democracy and reunification, bringing to light its treacherous nature, and followed in the footsteps of the preceding dictators who committed so many crimes.
					
					 The above-said policy pursued by the Lee group is nothing but a sycophantic and treacherous policy and a fascist repressive policy aimed to maintain and strengthen outside forces' system of colonial domination, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 The Lee group has mercilessly cracked down upon the protests of people from all walks of life against its treacherous moves, while going busy with its moves to upgrade the south Korea-U.S. relations to the "relations of strategic alliance in the 21st century". The group of traitors is perpetrating such acts of treachery as allowing the U.S. to escalate its domination and interference into all fields including politics, economy and military affairs of south Korea and offering the whole of south Korea to it as an outpost for carrying out its strategy for invading the DPRK. These acts are now being zealously pushed forward under the backing of the above-said fascist dictatorship.
					
					 What such dictatorial rule of the Lee group has brought to the south Korean people over the past little more than one year is nothing but subordination and the absence of rights.
					
					 The said fascist dictatorship has bedeviled the inter-Korean relations and done serious harm to the national reconciliation and unity. 
					
					 The present ruling forces of south Korea have worked with blood-shot eyes to bring to naught the successes made in the June 15 era of reunification, vociferating about "the lost decade". The Lee group has intensified the fascist suppression of the pro-reunification democratic forces of various circles in south Korea desirous of national unity and the reunification through an alliance with the north, while stepping up the policy of confrontation towards those compatriots calling for the sincere implementation of the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 Free discussion of the issue of national reunification by the pro-reunification patriotic organizations and people and their activities for it are hardly thinkable nor it is possible to expect reconciliation and unity between the north and the south as long as the above-said dictatorship is allowed to go on in south Korea, concludes the article.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Fascist Repressive Actions Flayed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Fascist Repressive Actions Flayed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Opposition parties including the Democratic Labour Party of south Korea on May 21 lodged a strong protest with the south Korean puppet authorities against the new fascist measure to crack down upon the civic and social organizations' anti-"government" actions.
					 They accused the authorities of adopting a high-handed policy to suppress the participants in rallies and demonstrations, adding that this was a threat to the popular masses and a serious violation of the basic rights of the people.
					
					 They assailed the authorities for perpetrating illegal acts themselves, though they never open their mouths without branding the actions of civic and social organizations as illegal ones. 
					
					 They deplored that such practices dating back to the days of the past dictatorship when those participants in the peaceful rallies and demonstrations were suppressed on charges of being "mobs" and "lawbreakers" are repeating themselves under the present regime.
					
					 Holding that the "government" threatening the people is a dictatorial regime, they urged it to keenly reflect on their crimes before blaming them.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Unpopular Educational Policy Accused in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Unpopular Educational Policy Accused in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Members of the Teachers' Union of south Korea and a student organization and parents of students held a rally in Seoul on May 23 to condemn the puppet authorities' unpopular educational policy.
					 The participants of the rally in a joint declaration noted that students and their parents are suffering from the unjust educational policy of the Lee Myung Bak "government."
					
					 The declaration stressed that the people would pool efforts and struggle to have the authorities' unpopular rule terminated and a progressive educational system established to enable everyone to have an ample opportunity to learn without any discrimination.
					
					 It urged the authorities to reinstate the unreasonably dismissed teachers and opt for settling the issue of registration fee.

articles.title: Chinese Figure on "Year of China-DPRK Friendship"
articles.content:
Chinese Figure on "Year of China-DPRK Friendship"
 Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- Song Enlei, head of a friendship delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, who visited the DPRK, said that they would contribute to significantly adorning the "year of China-DPRK friendship."
					 He noted that the friendly relations between the two countries were provided by President Kim Il Sung together with Chairman Mao Zedong, Premier Zhou Enlai and other revolutionaries of the elder generation of China.
					
					The traditional China-DPRK friendship, which has steadily developed, standing all trials of history, is being further strengthened under the deep care of President Hu Jintao and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 Colorful functions being staged in the two countries in the "year of China-DPRK friendship" marking the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations will be conducive to boosting the China-DPRK friendly relations, a common precious wealth, he said, expressing belief that the Korean people would certainly open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in the near future under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Brutal Crackdown Condemned
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Brutal Crackdown Condemned
Pyongyang, May 27 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on May 16 in denunciation of the south Korean authorities' crackdown upon the progressive forces and in support of the south Korean people's cause of justice.
					 Expressing indignation at the south Korean authorities' brutal suppression of the South Headquarters of Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), the statement said:
					
					 It is a blatant challenge to the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and a fascist deed designed to block the south Korean people's independent movement for the reunification and stifle the progressive forces under the pretext of "elimination of the pro-north leftist forces."
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" is a downright puppet regime as it is persistently curbing Korea's independent reunification and turning south Korea into a more dependent colony of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 We scathingly denounce the Lee group's fascist crackdown upon the progressive patriotic forces.
					
					 May 18 marks the 29th anniversary of the heroic Kwangju popular uprising, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The uprising was an all-people resistance against the U.S. imperialists' policy of neo-colonial domination over south Korea and the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist dictatorial regime, and it was a heroic action registered as a brilliant chapter in the history of the south Korean people's struggle for independence, democracy and reunification.
					
					 The uprising greatly encouraged the people of developing countries in the struggle against imperialism and for national liberation.
					
					 We will remember the uprisers, and call upon the world's progressive people to struggle against the Lee group of south Korea.

articles.title: CRPP condena participacion de banda de MB en "PSI"
articles.content:
CRPP condena participacion de banda de MB en "PSI"
 Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ATCC) -- En relacion con que la banda de Lee Myung Bak publico oficialmente la participacion total en la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion (PSI, en ingles)", el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 27 la siguiente declaracion:
					 La banda de Lee Myung Bak del Sur de Corea, que recurre con frenesi al enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y las maquinaciones de guerra en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, publico oficialmente el dia 26 la participacion total del Sur de Corea en la PSI pese a la unanime oposicion de toda la nacion coreana y la opinion publica interna y externa.
					
					  La "PSI" es un aparato de guerra agresiva organizado por EE.UU. contra la RPDC bajo el pretexto de interceptar y bloquear los barcos o aviones sospechosos que se cargaron de las armas nucleares, misiles y otros artefactos de exterminio masivo.
					
					  La  "PSI" es un objeto de la condenacion y el rechazo del interior y exterior por su caracter agresivo e ilegalidad.
					
					  En particular, en la Peninsula Coreana en que se torna agudo el estado de enfrentamiento militar y existe permanentemente el peligro del conflicto armado, la misma participacion total en la "PSI" significa prender fuego a la mecha de la guerra.
					
					  Por lo tanto, la RPDC ya vino advirtiendo severamente desde hace mucho tiempo las maquinaciones de participacion de las autoridades surcoreanas en la "PSI" y particularmente, aclaro reiteradamente que se enfrentara rotundamente a eso considerando como la declaracion de guerra las maquinaciones de la banda de Lee Myung Bak para la participacion total en la "PSI" siguiendo a ciegas a su amo norteamericano. 
					
					Sin embargo, la banda de Lee perpetro abiertamente la participacion total en la "PSI" que no se atrevieron a realizar los "poderes" anteriores del Sur de Corea. Por eso, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y las relaciones Norte-Sur pasaron el limite del peligro de guerra irremediable.
					
					  Es absurdo el que la banda de Lee decidio la participacion total en la "PSI" pretextando la prueba nuclear subterranea autodefensiva de la RPDC.
					
					  La prueba nuclear de los paises con armas nucleares no es extrana sino justa.
					
					  EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites arman los alborotos contra la RPDC acusando dicha prueba nuclear, lo cual no es para prevenir la proliferacion nuclear sino para aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					Ya que los titeres surcoreanos se atrevieron a declarar la guerra contra los connacionales con la participacion total en la "PSI" al incorporarse a las fuerzas extranjeras, la RPDC no puede menos de tomar las medidas resueltas de acuerdo con la advertencia ya hecha.
					
					En relacion con la situacion dada, el CRPP declara solemnemente como sigue:
					
					1)   La RPDC considerara como violacion y grave provocacion a la soberania sagrada y el territorio de nuestro pais cualquier intento de atreverse a parar, controlar y registrar los barcos coreanos y tomara la represalia rotunda e implacable dondequiera que este.
					
					2)   Puesto que las autoridades surcoreanas hicieron la declaracion de guerra que viola violentamente la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC a traves de su participacion total en la "PSI", nuestro pais respondera con las medidas de accion practica al igual que en tiempo de guerra.
					
					La RPDC nunca perdonara a la banda traidora titere del Sur de Corea que se aferra locamente a la confrontacion y la guerra perdiendo el juicio como lacayo de las maniobras de guerra agresiva de las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					  La banda de Lee asumira la entera responsabilidad de la grave consecuencia que se emane de sus imprudentes actos hostiles a la RPDC.

articles.title: Representacion de Phanmunjom declara posicion de principios
articles.content:
Representacion de Phanmunjom declara posicion de principios
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ATCC) -- La Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom publico este miercoles una declaracion en relacion con que la situacion insegura de Corea corre al extremo que puede estallar la guerra en cualquier momento debido a la imprudente “participacion total” de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak en la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion" (PSI en ingles) liderada por Estados Unidos
					  Obama y otros gobernantes actuales del imperio picotean que es “necesaria la conversion de la PSI en el eterno sistema internacional" e incorporaron a los titeres surcoreanos instigandolos al respecto, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					  Esto es la violacion flagrante y la clara negacion al derecho internacional y al acuerdo de armisticio de Corea que prohibe el “bloqueo de cualquier tipo” contra otra parte beligerante.
					
					  La horda del traidor Lee, encarnizada por el servicio y la sumision a grandes potencias, decidio sin titubeo la "participacion total" en la “PSI” obedeciendo a ciego a la exigencia de su amo.
					
					  Al respecto, la Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom aclaro la posicion de principios de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias como sigue:
					
					1. Las fuerzas armadas revolucionaras de la RPDC consideraran como la declaracion de guerra contra nuestro pais la "participacion total de la PSI" de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak segun ya anunciamos al mundo.
					
					  De acuerdo con eso, estigmatizaran cualquier acto minimo hostil incluyendo el control y pesquisa sobre los pacificos barcos coreanos de atentado imperdonable a la soberania de la RPDC y responderan de inmediato a este acto con el poderoso ataque militar.
					
					2. Tambien, nuestro ejercito estara libre de trabas por mas tiempo del acuerdo de armisticio en tales circunstancias en que muy desasosegados de las maniobras de aplazamiento a Corea, los actuales gobernantes de EE.UU. incorporaron por fin a los titeres surcoreanos a la "PSI" abandonando hasta la responsabilidad del firmante de dicho acuerdo de armisticio al cabo de negar la ley internacional y este documento.
					
					Si el acuerdo de armisticio pierde la fuerza de restriccion, en el sentido legal la Peninsula Coreana se vera pronto en estado de la guerra y las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC pasaran al acto militar.
					
					3. Por inmediato, no podran ser garantizadas la posicion legal de las 5 islas de la parte surcoreana (Paekryong, Taechong, Sochong, Yonphyong y U) en las aguas territoriales al Noroeste de la linea de demarcacion militar de la parte nortena del Mar Oeste de Corea y la navegacion segura de los barcos de buque y embarcaciones generales de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas y el ejercito naval titere que actuan en las aguas de alrededores de dichas islas.
					
					  Es anormal el que solo la RPDC lo ejecuta en las condiciones de que los imperialistas yanquis y la banda del traidor Lee renunciaron la justa demanda de ley internacional y el acuerdo de ambas partes.
					
					  Si ellos piensan que la ley de la selva, teoria al estilo norteamericano surte efecto para la RPDC, se equivocan mucho.
					
					  Deben darse clara cuenta de que tambien la RPDC tiene poderosisimas fuerzas militares y el modo de ataque al estilo coreano capaces de apoderarse, cuando si se necesita, de una tirada de los objetos vecinos o tocar la parte mortal de EE.UU.  
					
					 Quienes tocan a la RPDC no podran evitar el implacable castigo.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena politica hostil a RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena politica hostil a RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ATCC) -- El pasado dia 6, el comite de relaciones exteriores de la Camara de Representantes de Estados Unidos presento al congreso el "proyecto de ley de control internacional sobre la extraccion y elaboracion de uranio para 2009" que prohibe ofrecer a Corea, Iran y Siria la tecnologia, los materiales y el servicio relativos con la extraccion y elaboracion de uranio y, al mismo tiempo, demanda al gobierno estadounidense ejercerles la sancion en caso de que transfieran tales tecnicas en colaboracion con otros paises.
					  Esto revela que EE.UU. persigue la linea de enfrentarse hasta el fin con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea adhiriendose a  la posicion de la fuerza.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual del dia 27 y continua:
					
					  La politica de sancion de EE.UU contra la RPDC es el grave desafio y la flagrante violacion a la dignidad, la soberania y el derecho a la existencia.
					
					  El imperio practica la sancion economica y la politica de bloqueo sobre la RPDC desde hace varios decenios e impide cruelmente el desarrollo de economia de la RPDC porque esta no le obedece.
					
					  En la actualidad, las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU. se tornan peores pese a los esfuerzos perseverantes de la sociedad internacional por estabilizar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, lo cual se debe enteramente a la politica hostil a la primera del segundo. He aqui la razon por la cual la RPDC presenta como premisa de la solucion del problema la renuncia de la politica hostil a Corea de EE.UU.
					
					  Mientras este imperio no cambia su posicion de hostilizar a la RPDC, no hay nada que cambiar.
					
					  Es ridiculo el que EE.UU. piensa en que pueda hacer rendirse a la RPDC con tal sancion.

articles.title: ATCC comenta acciones histericas de Abe
articles.content:
ATCC comenta acciones histericas de Abe
Pyongyang, 27 de mayo (ATCC) -- Se ha desencadenado otra vez la histeria politica del ex premier japones Abe, figura representativa de las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas de Japon.
					 Como parte de su mezquina y habitual chismografia anti-RPDC, ese militarista fanatico por hostilizar a esta volvio a destacar recientemente la "necesidad" de regular las legislaciones para facilitar el ataque de la base de misiles de ella.
					
					 El expediente de sus disparates y acciones hechos en todos los momentos decisivos basta para conocer su naturaleza de reaccionario de la historia y elemento ultraderechista.
					
					 El politiquero Abe es ultranacionalista ejemplar que se ha contagiado del clima fascista que aparecio en la sociedad japonesa en los tiempos posbelicos.
					
					 El temperamento de connotado reaccionario derechista, Abe, se manifiesta patentemente en su posicion sobre la RPDC.
					
					 Fue el quien bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza de misiles" proveniente de la RPDC, se puso al frente de la campana para prohibir la entrada en Japon del barco coreano "Mangyongbong-92" poniendo en vigor la "ley de prohibicion de la entrada de las embarcaciones determinadas" y demando a la ONU que convocara el Consejo de Seguridad por tratar la sancion contra la RPDC diciendo que "Japon analizara todas las medidas posibles de sancion".
					
					  En su mandato que duro apenas un ano, el elevo al ministerial el rango de la Agencia de Autodefensa, a lo que no se atrevieron sus antecesores, y reclamo por instituir la "ley permanente" y fundar el "consejo de seguridad", organizacion coordinadora de las politicas.
					
					 Dijo que "en Japon no hay ni hubo los criminales de guerra y es ilegal e invalida en virtud de la ley japonesa la sentencia a ejecucion del tribunal internacional de Tokio". 
					
					 Defendio activamente la visita al "Santuario Yasukuni", nego totalmente el crimen de las "ex consoladoras sexuales" para las tropas japonesas del siglo pasado y fomento el izamiento de la bandera "Hinomaru" y el canto de "Kimigayo" en las escuelas, etc.
					
					  La sociedad internacional esta atenta a lo esencial de las obstinadas e irracionales maniobras anti-RPDC de Abe.
					
					  ?El creera acaso que la seguridad de su pais esta corriendo un peligro real e inminente? Seguro que no.
					
					 Es que sus acciones anti-RPDC parten de su sucia ambicion politica de ganar el terreno politico al alzar su popularidad inyectando en los habitantes el sentimiento a favor de la confrontacion entre las naciones y la conciencia hostil a la RPDC.
					
					 Aunque fue destronado mientras producia una revuelta en el circulo politico de Japon, ese vulnerable ex premier sigue abrigando la ambicion del poder.
					
					  Lo peor del caso esta en el terreno politico de Japon que deja pasearse libremente a los tipejos de la calana de Abe.
					
					  Hoy dia, ahi son calificadas de "patrioticas"  las acciones de los elementos como Abe que andan ajetreados para reproducir su pasado lleno de crimenes.
					
					  Con el paso del tiempo, se aceleran el proceso de derechizacion de la politica y la transformacion de la sociedad de manera reaccionaria y conservadora.
					
					  La paz y la seguridad de Asia son amenazadas por ellos que intentan dar marcha atras a la historia.
					
					  No hay futuro a Japon que impulsa a toda fuerza la militarizacion a instigacion de los maniacos del militarismo.
